title: Job search - the pre-interview (Captioned)
creator_credit: Australia. Dept. of Employment, Education and Training
brief_description: Through the eyes of three school leavers, we see how jobs are researched using available community resources to obtain work information. Use of the CES, municipal libraries, newspapers and parental advice is covered. The program also covers the correct preparation of job applications.
